name: JunkCloud
overview:
JunkCloud manages the â€œclassifiedsâ€ experience by combining the natural competition of an eBay auction with the simplicity of free-form online marketplaces like Craigslist.

It is a simple and intuitive online tool with the power to manage multiple listings across many marketplaces. It ensures you always end up with the best offer for your item.

The service generates a unique link to include in your online classified posting which directs interested buyers to your JunkCloud offer form. There they view offers, make offers, ask questions, or plead their case. The seller sees all of this activity aggregated in one place (by listing, if there are multiple ones) and can choose the Best Offer.
